Character

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.Element
      • Character.Player

  • public class Player
extends Element
    Class is used to create a player on the screen.
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Bruce Williams (972648)

      • checkInventory

        public boolean checkInventory(int i)
        checks if a specific item is in the inventory of the player. Item is specified by an int.
        Parameters:
        i - itemID.
        Returns:
        TRUE if inventory contains that specified item, else FALSE.

      • dropCol

        public void dropCol(int i)
        Removes a specified item from inventory.
        Parameters:
        i - The itemID.

      • movable

        public boolean movable(Cell cell)
        checks if player can move onto specified cell and responds appropriately.
        Parameters:
        cell - cell on board.
        Returns:
        True if given tile is movable, else false.

      • movableColouredDoor

        private boolean movableColouredDoor(ColouredDoor cell)
        Checks whether the coloured door can be walked onto. Potentially opens the ColouredDoor if the right key is in the inventory.
        Parameters:
        cell - The ColouredDoor to be checked.
        Returns:
        True if the cell can be walked on. False, otherwise.

      • movableTokenDoor

        private boolean movableTokenDoor(TokenDoor cell)
        Checks whether the given token door can be walked onto. Potentially opens the token door if there are enough tokens in the inventory.
        Parameters:
        cell - The TokenDoor to be checked.
        Returns:
        True if the cell can be walked on. False otherwise.
